results.title: Simvastatin protects against long-lasting behavioral and morphological consequences of neonatal hypoxic/ischemic brain injury.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, in contrast to the @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, @DISEASE_Hypoxia @DISEASE_MESH:D000860 @@@hypoxia@@@/@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@-injured @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ pretreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ were not hyperactive at weaning and showed less @<m>DISEASE_Facial_Asymmetry</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005146 @@@behavioral asymmetry@@@.

citations.NLM: Balduini W, De Angelis V, Mazzoni E, Cimino M. Simvastatin protects against long-lasting behavioral and morphological consequences of neonatal hypoxic/ischemic brain injury. Stroke. 2001 Sep;32(9):2185-91. PMID: 11546915
